name: Evernote Archive
summary: Learn about .ENEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Evernote allows users to sync their notes with the Evernote online service so that notes can be accessed from the Web, mobile devices, and the local computer. Therefore, ENEX files are generally used for local backups and for transferring notes manually.
ENEX files can be exported by choosing File → Export Notes to Archive.... They can be imported by choosing File → Import Notes from Archive....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
